column6: Operations with local community engagement, impact assessments, and development programs
column8: The Change A Life Boarding Centre
column13: Between 2018 and 2022, our team raised more than AU$600,000 to support the creation of a new boarding centre adjacent to the World Youth International School. The Change A Life Boarding Centre opened in November 2022. It will provide a home to 50 students in grades 11 and 12 as they undertake their studies. The boarding centre will benefit students who need help to make the daily trip to and from school during the monsoon season. The foundations of the building have been built to earthquake standards, with the option of adding additional levels.
column20: The Change A Life Boarding Centre, daily trip, moonsoon season
